docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: With a title
Our Mission
docs.text: To create an amazing MkDocs site with ease.

docs.title: Why Choose Us?
docs.text:
1. Simple and clean documentation.
  2. Enhanced with Material Design theme.
  3. Highly customizable.

docs.title: Admonitions
docs.text:
Tip: MkDocs is great for creating documentation sites!

Warning

Be sure to keep your mkdocs.yml file updated.

  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Slide 1: Introduction
docs.text: Welcome to this presentation about MkDocs and Presentations.

docs.title: Slide 2: Why Use MkDocs for Presentations?
docs.text:
• Simple setup
  • Markdown-based
  • Supports themes like Material

docs.title: PowerPoint Presentation
docs.text:
An example of a codeblock for python:

add_numbers.py
# Function to add two numbers 
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2 

# Example usage 
result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print('The sum is:', result)

Example codeblock for javascript with line highlighted:

concatenate_strings.js
// Function to concatenate two strings 
function concatenateStrings(str1, str2) {
    return str1 + str2;
}

// Example usage
const result = concatenateStrings("Hello, ", "World!");
console.log("The concatenated string is:", result);

docs.title: code blocks in content tabs
Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagram
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram 
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request 
  loop Health 
    Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health 
  end 
  Note right of Terminal: System online 
  Terminal-->> Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data 
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data
